word: Très bien. Merci. Tu as un animal de compagnie
meaning: Very well. Thank you. Do you have a pet?

word: Oui, j'ai un chat. Et toi?
meaning: Yes, I have a cat. And you?

word: Non, mais mon père a un chien.
meaning: No, but my father has a dog.

word: Bonjour, je m'appelle Marie. Ma famille habite à Paris.
meaning: Hello, my name is Marie. My family lives in Paris.
I have a garden in Paris.

word: Dan le jardin, je joue avec mon animal de compagnie, un chat.
meaning: In the garden, I play with my pet, a cat.

word: Nous allons au restaurant mexicain avec ma famille. Tu veux venir?
meaning: We are going to the Mexican restaurant with my family. Do you want to come?

word: Euh... Qui va au restaurant? J'étudie...
meaning: Uh... Who is going to the restaurant? I'm studying...

word: Mon grand-père, ma grand-mère, ma mère, mon père, ma sœur. Et mon cousin.
meaning: My grandfather, my grandmother, my mother, my father, my sister. And my cousin.

word: Salut, Lisa. Je vais bien. Merci. Et toi?
meaning: Hello, Lisa. I'm well. Thank you. And you?

word: Bien, merci! Ta sœur s'appelle Julia?
meaning: Well, thank you! Is your sister named Julia?

word: Non, c'est ma fille qui s'appelle Julia.
meaning: No, it's my daughter whose name is Julia.

word: Oh d'accord. Ta mère est française?
meaning: Oh okay. Is your mother French?

word: Oui, et mon père habite en Italie.
meaning: Yes, and my father lives in Italy.

word: C'est chouette. Ma famille habite à Paris
meaning: That's cool/nice. My family lives in Paris.

word: Ça va. Merci. Où habite ta famille?
meaning: I'm fine. Thank you. Where does your family live?

word: Ma famille habite en France. Et ta sœur?
meaning: My family lives in France. And your sister?
My sister is studying in Italy.

word: Ah chouette! Ton frère va bien?
meaning: Oh great! Is your brother doing well?

word: Oui, mon frère va bien. Merci!
meaning: Yes, my brother is well. Thank you!

word: Ton fils? Comment s'appelle ton fils?
meaning: Your son? What is your son's name?
My son, Junior... Where is he?
He is here, in the hotel!

word: Salut Papa! C'est mon animal de compagnie, Praline!
meaning: Hello Papa! This is my pet, Praline!
